bill.title: Electronic Warrant Vouchers; Bill of Materials
bill.description: Allows the department of education, department of accounting and general services, and the University of Hawaii to accept electronically mailed warrant vouchers for bills of materials, supplies, and incidentals as original documentation, the receipt of which authorizes payment to be made to each individual to whom the State is indebted.

history.action: (H) Referred to EDN/HED, FIN, referral sheet 1
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by EDN/HED on Wednesday, 01-27-10 2:00 pm in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on EDN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Takumi, Berg, Chang, Hanohano, Nakashima, Rhoads, Saiki, Shimabukuro, Takai, Yamane, Ching; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Bertram, Manahan, Pine.

(H) The committees on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Nakashima, Berg, Hanohano, Rhoads, Saiki, Shimabukuro, Takai, Takumi, Yamane, Ching; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Bertram, Manahan, Pine.
(H) Reported from EDN/HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 34-10), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and McKelvey, Pine, Tokioka excused (3).
